thread.title: Donald Trump to tweet about Democratic debate
thread.title_full: Donald Trump to tweet about Democratic debate

title: Donald Trump to tweet about Democratic debate
text:
Donald Trump to tweet about Democrati... Donald Trump to tweet about Democratic debate There are 4 comments on the USA Today story from 4 hrs ago, titled Donald Trump to tweet about Democratic debate . In it, USA Today reports that: 
"At the request of many, and even though I expect it to be a very boring two hours, I will be covering the Democrat Debate live on twitter!" the Republican front-runner tweeted Tuesday. At the request of many, and even though I expect it to be a very boring two hours, I will be covering the Democrat Debate live on twitter! Expect a lot of Trump criticism of Democratic front-runner Hillary Clinton, who got in her own shots at the billionaire businessman Monday as she visited a picket line by workers who want to unionize one of Trump's hotels. Join the discussion below, or Read more at USA Today.
